name: ponger (demo)
description:
Imagine a classic like pong with the modern day shooter. 

Well you get this game, ponger!

an evil AI decided to challenge the human skills through on of the first video games in humanity, pong.

Hello there, how are you? I hope you're doing well.
I'm currently very busy and I had no budget nor time to make music for the game, I know it's not the best in the world.
But I'm busy and I may revisit this game in the future once I have a composer or enough budget or time.
It's not a full game and I'm sorry if I wasted your time, I hope you enjoy it.
thanks for everything.
